price: Basi wakitubu na wakashika Swala na wakatoa Zaka, basi ni ndugu zenu katika Dini. Na tunazichambua Aya kwa watu wajuao.
arabic: فَإِن تَابُواْ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُاْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَإِخۡوَٰنُكُمۡ فِي ٱلدِّينِۗ وَنُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: Wakitubia, wakaacha ukafiri wao, na wakashika hukumu za Uislamu, kwa kushika Swala, na kutoa Zaka, basi wanakuwa ni ndugu zenu katika Dini. Haki yao kama haki yenu. Jukumu lao kama jukumu lenu. Na Mwenyezi Mungu anazibainisha Aya hizi kwa watu wanao nafiika na ilimu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-in tābū wa-aqāmū al-ṣalata waātawū al-zakata fa-ikh'wānukum fī al-dīni wanufaṣṣilu al-āyāti liqawmin yaʿlamūna
